#sidebar TableOfContents

= Color=

Class header file: [http://code.google.com/p/bwapi/source/browse/trunk/bwapi/include/BWAPI/Color.h# BWAPI/Color.h]

Methods:
  * Color(int id); - creates a color using color id from the Starcraft color palette.
  * Color(int red, int green, int blue); - creates a color using the color from the Starcraft color palette that is closest to the given RGB color.
  * int red() const;
  * int green() const;
  * int blue() const;
  * int getID() const;

The 256 color palette used by Starcraft: BroodWar:

[http://imgur.com/RyPjC.png]

The two sets of pixels outlined in green are pixels that change color each frame, (cycle from left to right).
